document.full_text: novartis ag's blood cancer drug inc424 could rake in annual sales of $1 billion, the group's head of oncology told reuters on tuesday, in a boost to the swiss drugmaker's cancer pipeline.
document.title: novartis sees blood cancer drug as blockbuster
lines_and_colors: novartis ag's blood cancer drug inc424 could rake in annual sales of $1 billion, the group's head of oncology told reuters on tuesday, in a boost to the swiss drugmaker's cancer pipeline.
